extendedIngredients.name: chicken breasts
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 (6 ounce) chicken breasts, butterflied or pounded thin

recipes.title: Bacon Wrapped Guacamole Stuffed Chicken

winePairing.pairingText: Chicken can be paired with Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc. White meat is typically paired with white wine as to not overpower the flavor of the meat, so chardonnay and sauvignon blanc are safe choices. Chicken prepared with a tomato sauce or certainly a red wine sauce can and should be served with a red like a pinot noir. You could try CalNaturale Chardonnay Lodi. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.1 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 11 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: CalNaturale Chardonnay Lodi
productMatches.description: Complexity and intensity define this Chardonnay. The nose is full of citrus, green apple and pear with floral overtones. The flavors are rich on entry with lively fruit in the mid palate and a long fruity, warm finish.

recipes.instructions: Lay the chicken flat, season the outside with salt and pepper, spread 1/4 of the guacamole on the chicken breasts, roll them up and wrap each in 2 slices of baconGrill over indirect medium heat, with the lid down, until the bacon is crispy and the chicken is cooked (160F to 165F), about 20-30 minutes, or bake in a preheated 400F/200C oven on a wire rack on a baking pan until cooked, about 20-30 minutes, turning the oven to broil for the last few minutes to ensure that the bacon is crispy.

steps.step: Lay the chicken flat, season the outside with salt and pepper, spread 1/4 of the guacamole on the chicken breasts, roll them up and wrap each in 2 slices of bacon

Grill over indirect medium heat, with the lid down, until the bacon is crispy and the chicken is cooked (160F to 165F), about 20-30 minutes, or bake in a preheated 400F/200C oven on a wire rack on a baking pan until cooked, about 20-30 minutes, turning the oven to broil for the last few minutes to ensure that the bacon is crispy.
